name: Spooky Mall
summary: Pack your stores with the items ghouls crave in Spooky Mall, a colorful endeavor to serve the undead. The job market is tough and no one seems to be giving you a chance. An odd phone call one night changes all of that when a special night job is offered. Beggars can't be choosers you think, and soon you're off but when you get there, something about the customers just doesn't seem right.
